Pre-Game Insights: The Pittsburgh Pirates and Cincinnati Reds are set to meet on September 22, 2024, in a three-game series finale at Great American Ball Park.
Hunter Greene will start for the Cincinnati Reds with a 9-4 record and a 2.83 ERA in 24 starts.
Paul Skenes will start for the Pittsburgh Pirates with a 10-3 record and a 2.07 ERA in 21 starts.
Others: Betting odds for the game have the Cincinnati Reds as underdogs with a +108 moneyline, while the Pittsburgh Pirates are favorites with a -128 moneyline.
The over/under for the game is not provided in the article.
